translation.en: [Pierre] The past… it is a dangerous place.
So many decisions that can't be undone.
translation.es: Tantas decisiones que no pueden deshacerse.

translation.en: So many ghosts.
In 1905, I accepted a job with the Romanovs,
translation.es: En 1905, acepté un trabajo con los Románov,

translation.en: Russia's royal family.
I saw their incredible wealth.
The palaces, the balls,
the jewelry.
-And then I saw the madness. -No!
The revolution.
It all ended here…
in this house
The richest family in the world,
translation.es: La familia más rica del mundo,

translation.en: the Emperor and the Empress of Russia, Nicholas and Alexandra…
translation.es: el emperador y la emperatriz de Rusia, Nicolás y Alejandra,

translation.en: their five children…
vanished…
without a trace.
Now there are rumors of a survivor.
translation.es: BERLÍN 7 AÑOS DESPUÉS Ahora hay rumores de una sobreviviente,

translation.en: A deeply troubled girl in Berlin who claims to be Anastasia,
translation.es: una chica muy perturbada en Berlín dice ser Anastasia,

translation.en: the Romanovs' youngest daughter.
translation.es: la hija más pequeña de los Románov.

translation.en: It is my task to see if she is telling the truth.
translation.es: Es mi deber averiguar si dice la verdad.

translation.en: [doctor] I understand they want you to identify her.
translation.es: Entiendo que quieren que la identifique.

translation.en: I worked in the family for 13 years.
translation.es: Trabajé para la familia durante 13 años.

translation.en: I was the children's tutor.
translation.es: Fui el tutor de los niños.

translation.en: Please.
Ana, you have a visitor.
She has retrograde amnesia.
Her memories are confused.
It's a common symptom.
Do you remember me?
[Pierre] In 1894,
Czar Alexander III died suddenly at the age of 49.
translation.es: el zar Alejandro III murió repentinamente a la edad de 49.

translation.en: Russia was in shock.
His heir, Nicholas, was just 26.
[Sergei] Jesus, he's fucking rotting.
You can't silence this, sweetheart, they've botched the embalming.
translation.es: No puedes callar esto, querida, lo embalsamaron mal.

translation.en: He stinks.
[Ella, whispering] She already looks like an empress.
Let's just hope she's a good breeder.
translation.es: Esperemos que sea buena para tener hijos.

translation.en: Are you all right?
I'm sorry there's been no time for us.
translation.es: Lamento que no haya tiempo para nosotros.

translation.en: -Mother. -Oh!
-Thank you, Alix. -I'll take her outside.
-I'll come. -No, no. You stay.
You'll be all right. I should go back.
I worry about you so.
The wedding, on top of all this.
[De Orellana] The young Nicholas II is quiet, indecisive,
translation.es: El joven Nicolás II es callado, indeciso...

translation.en: and very much living in the shadow
translation.es: KING'S COLLEGE DE LONDRES ...vive a la sombra de su tío Sergio, el imponente gran duque.

translation.en: of his great, imposing Grand Duke Uncle Sergei.
translation.es: ...vive a la sombra de su tío Sergio, el imponente gran duque.

translation.en: To be czar is to be field martial, emperor,
translation.es: Ser zar es... ESCRITOR DE LOS ROMÁNOV ...ser capitán general, emperador, primer ministro, todas estas cosas,

translation.en: prime minister, all of these things,
translation.es: ...ser capitán general, emperador, primer ministro, todas estas cosas,

translation.en: pope, all rolled into one.
[De Orellana] This is like a medieval monarchy
where the czar has ultimate control over everything.
translation.es: donde el zar tiene el máximo control sobre todo.

translation.en: [Montefiore] And what man in the world is qualified for such a post?
translation.es: ¿Y qué hombre en el mundo está calificado para tal cargo?

translation.en: Get you through the next few hours, eh?
What am I going to do, Sandro?
I'm not ready to be Czar.
translation.es: No estoy listo para ser zar.

translation.en: You were born for this.
I can't run a country.
I have so much more to learn.
And who will teach me now?
You don't need a teacher.
Trust yourself. God chose you.
translation.es: Confía en ti mismo. Dios te eligió.

translation.en: Divine bloody right.
[Hetherington] The Russian Empire that Nicholas II inherits
translation.es: El Imperio ruso que hereda Nicolás II

translation.en: is one of the largest empires the world has ever seen.
translation.es: es uno de los imperios más grandes que ha visto el mundo.

translation.en: [Montefiore] It was colossal. It was a sixth of the world's surface.
translation.es: Era colosal, de un sexto del tamaño de la superficie del mundo.

translation.en: There were over 146 nationalities, many languages.
translation.es: Había más de 146 nacionalidades, muchas lenguas.

translation.en: And the Romanovs have ruled Russia for almost 300 years.
translation.es: Y los Románov gobernaron Rusia durante casi 300 años.

translation.en: Their wealth is beyond computation.
An embarrassment of riches.
Land, gold mines, diamond mines,
translation.es: tierras, minas de oro, de diamantes,

translation.en: the famous Fabergé eggs. There are palaces everywhere.
translation.es: los famosos huevos de Fabergé, palacios por todas partes.

translation.en: Marrying into this world is Alexandra of Hesse,
translation.es: Y Alejandra de Hesse se casa con ese mundo,

translation.en: a shy, religious girl
brought up in a tiny German principality.
translation.es: que creció en un pequeño principado de Alemania.

translation.en: If Catherine the Great wore them, so can you.
translation.es: Si Catalina la Grande los usó, tú también.

translation.en: There.
Smile, Sunny.
Mother and Father would have been so proud of you.
translation.es: Mamá y papá estarían muy orgullosos de ti.

translation.en: It's all right.
It's been a hell of a few weeks.
Are you sure it's not bad luck?
translation.es: ¿Segura que no es de mala suerte?

translation.en: Having the wedding while we're all still mourning?
The people say I come to them behind a coffin.
translation.es: La gente dice que llego a ellos detrás de un ataúd.

translation.en: Well, that's not true.
I don't know the customs of this country.
translation.es: No conozco las costumbres de este país.

translation.en: -I can't even speak Russian. -[laughs]
I can help with that.
I feel such an outsider.
I was a foreign princess once.
translation.es: Alguna vez fui una princesa extranjera.

translation.en: Head up.
Neck straight.
Carry the weight, proudly.
Welcome…
Czarina and Empress of all Russia.
translation.es: zarina y emperatriz de toda Rusia.

translation.en: Now you're one of us.
[De Orellana] Alexandra of Hesse is a granddaughter of Queen Victoria.
translation.es: Alejandra de Hesse es la nieta de la reina Victoria.

translation.en: She is deeply religious, and this obsession with religion
translation.es: Es muy religiosa, y esa obsesión con la religión

translation.en: plays a key role in her marriage to Nicholas
translation.es: juega un papel clave en su matrimonio con Nicolás

translation.en: and in her role as Czarina of Russia.
translation.es: y en su rol como zarina de Rusia.

translation.en: [Hetherington] This marriage is unusual as a Romanov marriage,
translation.es: Este matrimonio es inusual para los Románov

translation.en: and for a royal marriage in general in this time period,
translation.es: y para cualquier matrimonio real en esa época.

translation.en: and that's because it's very much a love match.
translation.es: Y es porque es una unión por amor.

translation.en: [Montefiore] They're one of the only royal couples in Europe that share a marital bed.
translation.es: Son una de las pocas parejas reales en Europa que duermen en la misma cama.

translation.en: Well, Mrs. Romanov.
-Got it. -[Alix giggles]
There.
Sorry.
You know, my father was a great leader.
translation.es: ¿Sabes? Mi padre era un gran líder.

translation.en: The people adored him.
It's not the people I worry about.
It's your family.
You need to be strong.
[whispers] You're the czar.
Master of the land.
The leader of all Russia.
The God-given one.
Nothing will ever come between us.
Come on. Come on.
Come on.
You're either on my side…
or in my fucking way.
[Smith] Rasputin is one of the most remarkable figures of the 20th century.
translation.es: Rasputín es una de las figuras más sorprendentes del siglo XX.

translation.en: Okay, we can talk.
But his background is sort of shrouded in mist and legend.
translation.es: Pero sus orígenes no son claros y son una leyenda.

translation.en: [Rasputin] Shit.
[De Orellana] His parents were farmers and church elders.
translation.es: Sus padres eran granjeros y ancianos de la iglesia.

translation.en: He was one of eight or nine siblings,
translation.es: Era uno de ocho o nueve hermanos,

translation.en: but it would seem that all of them died in his childhood.
translation.es: pero parece que todos murieron durante la niñez.

translation.en: [Montefiore] Rasputin, he drinks, he fights with his father.
translation.es: Rasputín bebe, pelea con su padre.

translation.en: He chases girls.
But, above all,
he's ungovernable, he's fearless.
[man] Quiet!
The horse is safe.
Back in his stable.
I only borrowed it.
You stole it!
Thieves must be punished.
[crowd] Banish him! Banish him!
I don't want to be a thief.
But we got to eat, huh?
You've got to eat. You need to eat.
I did a bad thing.
But I did it…
for my wife.
And my son.
What do you want to do with him?
-[woman 1] Banish him! -[crowd yelling angrily]
-[woman 2] Punish him! -What about my family?
You can't do this. You can't do this. Give me a chance, hmm?
translation.es: No puede hacer esto. Deme una oportunidad.

translation.en: Give me a chance.
Send me on a pilgrimage, hmm?
Come on.
[man] This is my judgment:
go on a pilgrimage, turn to God,
translation.es: vaya a peregrinar, acuda a Dios,

translation.en: but leave the village now.
Will you really go to the monastery?
I don't know.
I won't let you down. Promise.
I love you.
Rasputin's wife, Praskovya, is a very long-suffering figure.
translation.es: La esposa de Rasputín, Praskovia, es una persona que sufrió mucho.

translation.en: It's hard to say if Praskovya loves Rasputin or not.
translation.es: No se sabe si lo ama a Rasputín o no.

translation.en: But she's a constant figure, a supportive figure.
translation.es: Pero es una figura constante y de apoyo.

translation.en: When Rasputin picks up and leaves home as a pilgrim in 1897,
translation.es: Cuando Rasputín deja su casa para peregrinar en 1897,

translation.en: he enters what might be considered his university.
translation.es: entra a lo que se considera la universidad.

translation.en: He sleeps out of doors,
he becomes infinitely aware of the beauty of the Russian landscape,
translation.es: toma consciencia de la hermosura de los paisajes rusos,

translation.en: of Russian life, of folk ways.
translation.es: de la vida rusa, de las costumbres populares.

translation.en: [Montefiore] He walked through all weathers,
translation.es: Caminó por todo tipo de climas,

translation.en: being soaked, being frozen, being sunburnt.
translation.es: se empapó, congeló y quemó por el sol.

translation.en: It was a really hard, strange, lonely life.
translation.es: Fue una vida dura, extraña y solitaria.

translation.en: But one that got him closer to God.
translation.es: Pero una que lo acercó a Dios.

translation.en: [De Orellana] Away from the Siberian plains, Russia is changing ever faster.
translation.es: Lejos de los valles siberianos, Rusia cambia rápidamente.

translation.en: [Montefiore] The telephone replaces the telegram.
Cars replace carriages.
Electric lights replace lamps.
translation.es: las luces eléctricas, a las lámparas.

translation.en: Nicholas becomes Czar at the dawn of the modern age.
translation.es: Nicolás se vuelve zar en el amanecer de la época moderna.

translation.en: [De Orellana] And Russia is industrializing at a breakneck speed,
translation.es: Y Rusia se industrializa a gran velocidad.

translation.en: hundreds of thousands of workers flock to the big cities,
translation.es: Cientos de miles de trabajadores van a las ciudades,

translation.en: creating huge social change.
[Montefiore] They're building railways, building factories.
Conditions there are appalling, workers' rights are nonexistent.
translation.es: Las condiciones son terribles, no existen los derechos de los trabajadores.

translation.en: So there was a great hunger for new political institutions.
translation.es: Había una gran hambre de nuevas instituciones políticas.

translation.en: Nicholas' first speech as Czar
translation.es: El primer discurso de Nicolás como zar

translation.en: is a great opportunity for him to show what kind of ruler he wants to be.
translation.es: es una gran oportunidad para demostrar qué clase de gobernante quiere ser.

translation.en: [Montefiore] In the early part of his reign,
Uncle Sergei is probably Nicky's most important advisor.
translation.es: el tío Sergio es quizá el asesor más importante de Nicky.

translation.en: He's very dogmatic, extremely right wing.
translation.es: Es muy dogmático, de extrema derecha.

translation.en: He's highly religious.
He's the ultimate Romanov hardliner.
[De Orellana] What Nicky is about to say is absolutely critical.
translation.es: Lo que Nicky está por decir es completamente crítico.

translation.en: He can either embrace democracy and modernity like Western Europe,
translation.es: Puede abrazar la democracia y la modernidad, como Europa Occidental,

translation.en: or he can choose to remain an absolute monarch.
translation.es: o puede elegir seguir siendo un monarca con todas las letras.

translation.en: [Nicky] I'm aware…
that recently in some zemstvos…
translation.es: de que recientemente en algunos zemstvos

translation.en: the people have been carried away with senseless dreams
translation.es: la gente se ha dejado llevar por sueños insensatos

translation.en: of taking part in the business of government.
translation.es: de querer participar en los negocios del gobierno.

translation.en: Let everyone know
that I will retain the principles of autocracy
translation.es: ...que mantendré los principios de la autocracia...

translation.en: as firmly…
and unbendingly…
as my unforgettable late father.
[Montefiore] It's Sergei who tells him to give the speech,
translation.es: Sergio le dice que haga el discurso

translation.en: and he encourages Nicholas to embrace sacred autocracy
translation.es: y anima a Nicolás a acoger la sagrada autocracia

translation.en: as the only way to rule Russia.
translation.es: como la única forma de gobernar Rusia.

translation.en: Good speech.
It's a terrible mistake. He stamps out any possibility of reform.
translation.es: Es un error terrible. Descarta toda posibilidad de reforma.

translation.en: [Hetherington] By showing that he has no intention of sharing power democratically,
translation.es: Al mostrar que no compartirá el poder de forma democrática,

translation.en: Nicholas lays the foundations of his own demise.
translation.es: Nicolás sienta las bases para su propio deceso.

translation.en: [Smith] Rasputin visits various monasteries,
including Verkhoturye, which is one of the great monasteries of Russia.
translation.es: incluyendo el Verkhoturye, uno de los grandes monasterios de Rusia.

translation.en: And he meets with the monks,
and he learns the gospels practically by heart.
translation.es: y se aprende los evangelios de memoria.

translation.en: And he becomes steeped in Russian Orthodoxy.
translation.es: Y se impregna de la ortodoxia rusa.

translation.en: But there's too much control,
there's too much order, there's too much discipline, there's too much routine.
translation.es: demasiado orden, demasiada disciplina, demasiada rutina.

translation.en: I can't find God here.
Come with me.
[Montefiore] Rasputin is a free spirit, and he seeks out some of the cults
translation.es: Rasputín es un espíritu libre y busca algunos de los cultos

translation.en: who have a different and much more instinctive,
translation.es: que tienen un enfoque distinto y más instintivo,

translation.en: and much more passionate approach to religion.
translation.es: y mucho más apasionado a la religión.

translation.en: Be full of joy and gladness, for Christ has risen!
translation.es: ¡Llénate de dicha y alegría porque Dios se ha levantado!

translation.en: Be full of joy and gladness, for Christ has risen!
translation.es: ¡Llénate de dicha y alegría porque Dios se ha levantado!

translation.en: Be full of…
Oh, God! We feel you!
Oh, God! Oh, God! Oh, God!
We feel your spirit, God!
We feel you!
We feel your spirit!
The Khlysty, which means "whips" in English,
are one of the most notorious of all Russian sects.
translation.es: son una de las sectas rusas con peor reputación.

translation.en: They're illegal, they operate in secret…
…and they engage in all sorts of wild orgiastic rites and rituals.
translation.es: tienen toda clase de ritos y rituales salvajes y orgiásticos.

translation.en: There's even talk that they cut off the breast of a virgin
translation.es: Se dice que cortaban el seno de una virgen

translation.en: and eat it at the end of their rites.
translation.es: y se lo comían al final de sus ritos.

translation.en: But there is a logic that underlies it all.
translation.es: Pero hay una lógica que sustenta todo.

translation.en: If one does not sin, one cannot repent.
translation.es: Si uno no peca, no puede arrepentirse.

translation.en: And without repenting, one cannot be saved.
translation.es: Y sin arrepentimiento, uno no puede salvarse.

translation.en: And this suits Rasputin right down to the ground.
translation.es: Y esto le viene muy bien a Rasputín.

translation.en: He's a man of enormous sexual appetite, he's a heavy drinker,
translation.es: Es un hombre con un gran apetito sexual, es un gran bebedor,

translation.en: he loves women, and he adopts this idea of sin leading to redemption
translation.es: ama a las mujeres y adopta la idea de que el pecado lleva a la redención como la esencia de su propia fe.

translation.en: as the essence of his own faith.
translation.es: de que el pecado lleva a la redención como la esencia de su propia fe.

translation.en: Rasputin has a true religious experience,
translation.es: Rasputín tiene una verdadera experiencia religiosa.

translation.en: and this launches him into becoming a holy pilgrim,
translation.es: Y eso lo lleva a convertirse en un peregrino sagrado,

translation.en: a new man imbued with religious fervor,
translation.es: un hombre nuevo, empapado de fervor religioso,

translation.en: traversing across vast expanses of the empire for many years.
translation.es: que recorre una vasta extensión del imperio durante muchos años.

translation.en: [De Orellana] For Nicky's coronation at the Khodynka Field,
translation.es: Para la coronación en el campo de Khodynka,

translation.en: people are invited to participate in a public feast for anyone that wants to come.
translation.es: invitan a todo el que quiera asistir a participar en una fiesta pública.

translation.en: There will be food and little commemorative gifts
from the Czar to his people.
[Alexandrova] The gifts include a kerchief, a commemorative mug,
translation.es: Los regalos incluyen un pañuelo, una taza conmemorativa,

translation.en: sausage, gingerbread, so it sounds wonderful to a regular Russian peasant.
translation.es: salchichas, pan de jengibre, así que esto suena fantástico para los campesinos.

translation.en: They flocked to the field even before dawn,
translation.es: Llegan en masa al campo antes del amanecer

translation.en: and some even walked on foot from Siberia in their Bass shoes.
translation.es: y algunos caminan desde Siberia en sus mocasines.

translation.en: That's fine, I'm done.
[Sandro] Looking good.
-Feeling shit. -[Sandro laughs]
Couldn't sleep.
You know, you're lucky. You'll never know responsibility like mine.
translation.es: Tienes suerte, jamás tendrás una responsabilidad como la mía.

translation.en: I'll never know money like yours either.
Or power.
Are you ready?
[sighs] As I'll ever be.
-Are you? -You wanted to see me?
How are the plans for Khodynka?
A fucking nightmare.
Too many peasants in one place, all wanting free food and drink.
translation.es: Demasiados campesinos en un solo lugar, todos quieren comer y beber gratis.

translation.en: You should send more Cossacks for crowd control.
translation.es: Deberías enviar más cosacos para controlarlos.

translation.en: I don't want to waste time and money on Cossacks.
translation.es: No quiero gastar tiempo y dinero en cosacos.

translation.en: It will be fine.
Do you want me to go after him?
You'll only aggravate him.
Isn't that the point?
Today is about us.
[Monetfiore] Uncle Sergei is in charge of the public event,
translation.es: El tío Sergio está a cargo del evento público

translation.en: and he really is expecting 2 or 300,000 peasants.
In fact, 800,000 peasants turn up.
The problem is that this feast has been very badly organized by Uncle Sergei.
translation.es: El problema es que la fiesta estuvo muy mal organizada por el tío Sergio.

translation.en: The field has been torn apart by military exercises,
translation.es: El campo quedó destrozado por ejercicios militares,

translation.en: and only a few planks have been put down to cover deep trenches.
translation.es: y solo pusieron algunos tablones para cubrir zanjas profundas.

translation.en: There are very few policemen to keep security.
translation.es: Hay pocos policías para la seguridad.

translation.en: [Alexandrova] The people in the stalls start panicking.
translation.es: La gente de los puestos comienza a asustarse.

translation.en: They start hurling those packages into the crowd.
translation.es: Empiezan a lanzar los paquetes a la multitud.

translation.en: Everyone starts to rush towards where they believe the presents are being given.
translation.es: Todos se apresuran a ir a donde creen que están dando los regalos.

translation.en: [Alexandrova] People start falling to the ground,
human dominoes, other people trample upon them.
translation.es: como fichas humanas de dominó, otra gente los pisotea.

translation.en: This scene is horrible carnage.
translation.es: La escena es una matanza horrible.

translation.en: [Montefiore] The coronation of a Russian Czar was magnificent,
translation.es: La coronación de un zar ruso era magnífica, majestuosa,

translation.en: majestic, jewel-infested, exquisite.
translation.es: La coronación de un zar ruso era magnífica, majestuosa, llena de joyas, exquisita, el costo era extraordinario.

translation.en: The cost was extraordinary.
translation.es: llena de joyas, exquisita, el costo era extraordinario.

translation.en: The rituals were complex and ancient.
translation.es: Los rituales eran complejos y antiguos.

translation.en: Everything was designed to project wealth,
translation.es: Todo estaba diseñado para mostrar la riqueza,

translation.en: power, and the glory of the dynasty.
translation.es: el poder y la gloria de la dinastía.

translation.en: The coronation really defines the emperor
translation.es: La coronación realmente define al emperador

translation.en: as a ruler whose power comes from God.
translation.es: como el gobernante cuyo poder emana de Dios.

translation.en: And Nicholas completely believes this and embraces it.
translation.es: Nicolás cree por completo eso y lo acoge.

translation.en: [whispering] It doesn't mean anything.
Oh, Lord, God of our fathers.
You have chosen me as sovereign and judge over your people.
translation.es: me has elegido como soberano y juez de tu pueblo.

translation.en: I confess to your inscrutable providence in selecting me.
translation.es: Acepto tu inescrutable Providencia al elegirme.

translation.en: Inspire and enlighten my path,
and direct my actions in this awe-inspiring mission.
translation.es: dirige mis acciones en esta impresionante misión.

translation.en: May the wisdom that descends always from your throne…
translation.es: Que la sabiduría que desciende siempre desde tu trono...

translation.en: abide with me.
How many dead?
[Sergei] It is yet to be confirmed.
A hundred?
-More? -As I say, it is yet to be confirmed.
How many hundred?
Unfortunately, we are talking thousands-- Thousands?
It is yet to be confirmed.
We must cancel the celebrations. I would advise against that.
translation.es: - Debemos cancelar las celebraciones. - No te lo aconsejo.

translation.en: But surely we must acknowledge the tragedy.
It is only a tragedy…
if you make it one.
Where you lead, others follow.
translation.es: Donde tú lideras... otros te siguen.

translation.en: [Montefiore] 2000, 3000 bodies of peasants
translation.es: Dos mil, tres mil cuerpos de campesinos

translation.en: lie on this coronation field, where soon there are to be festivities,
translation.es: yacen en el campo de la coronación, donde pronto serían las festividades,

translation.en: the Czar, the Grand Duke, the Royal Family are to arrive.
translation.es: el zar, el gran duque, la familia real están por llegar.

translation.en: And some of the bodies they just pile into carts,
translation.es: Y algunos de los cuerpos están apilados en carretas.

translation.en: so that as the Royal Family are going out to the Khodynka Field,
translation.es: En cuanto la familia real entra al campo de Khodynka,

translation.en: they pass carriages where they think the people are waving at them,
translation.es: pasan carruajes donde creen que la gente los saluda

translation.en: and suddenly, as they get close, they realize
translation.es: y de pronto, al acercarse, se dan cuenta

translation.en: that these are all dead people, crushed to death.
translation.es: de que son personas que murieron aplastadas.

translation.en: Nicky should have done what a modern politician would do:
translation.es: Nicky debió hacer lo que un político moderno haría,

translation.en: go to all the hospitals, and be seen to be visiting and showing love for his people.
translation.es: ir a los hospitales, hacer visitas y mostrar amor por su gente.

translation.en: What he, in fact, does is to make a decision against his better judgment,
translation.es: Lo que hace, en realidad, es tomar una decisión contra su mejor juicio:

translation.en: to go to the party of the Marquis de Montebello, the French ambassador.
translation.es: ir a la fiesta del marqués de Montebello, el embajador francés.

translation.en: [Alix] I can't. It's not right.
Just this one, then we'll have done our duty.
translation.es: Solo este, para cumplir nuestro deber.

translation.en: This will come back to haunt us.
translation.es: Esto nos va a acosar después.

translation.en: There's no room for sentimentality in politics.
translation.es: No hay espacio para el sentimentalismo en la política.

translation.en: You should have sent more Cossacks to manage the crowds.
translation.es: Debiste enviar más cosacos para manejar a la multitud.

translation.en: The people won't forgive him.
Grow up.
This blood will stain his reign.
Fucking kids.
[De Orellana] In the first day of his reign,
translation.es: El primer día de su reinado, el zar y su esposa alemana

translation.en: the Czar and his German wife were dancing and drinking,
translation.es: El primer día de su reinado, el zar y su esposa alemana bailaron y bebieron

translation.en: even as hundreds and thousands of Muscovites had been killed.
translation.es: mientras cientos y miles de moscovitas habían muerto.

translation.en: [Montefiore] And from this point onwards, he is known as Nicholas the Bloody.
translation.es: Y desde este punto en adelante, es conocido como Nicolás el Sangriento.

translation.en: It's a disastrous beginning to Nicholas' reign.
translation.es: Es un inicio desastroso para el reinado de Nicolás.

translation.en: [Rasputin] Friend.
Would you have food and a bed for the night?
translation.es: ¿Me darías abrigo y comida para pasar la noche?

translation.en: -Of course. -Thank you.
Very nice, thank you.
What's all this shaking, old man?
Too many seasons.
Feel God flow in you again.
translation.es: Siente a Dios fluir en ti de nuevo.

translation.en: That's it. That's it.
[whispering] Breathe his spirit.
Remember how they ran.
The hills they climbed.
It's all still there.
Good.
[Smith] Rasputin becomes more and more convinced of his own abilities,
translation.es: Rasputín se convence cada vez más de sus habilidades,

translation.en: of his power as a healer…
his insight into human nature.
translation.es: de su comprensión de la naturaleza humana.

translation.en: [Montefiore] He's superb at getting close to people. He has empathy.
translation.es: Es estupendo para acercarse a la gente. Tiene empatía.

translation.en: He has a feral charisma.
[Smith] And then he has those eyes.
And he knows the effect that these eyes have on people.
translation.es: Y sabe el efecto que tienen esos ojos en la gente.

translation.en: Especially women.
It's all right to sin.
It brings us closer to God.
How can you be redeemed if you haven't sinned?
translation.es: ¿Cómo vas a ser redimida si no has pecado?

translation.en: [Smith] He's a man who emits electricity from his fingertips.
translation.es: Es un hombre que emite electricidad con las yemas de los dedos.

translation.en: His physical presence is something that overwhelms people.
translation.es: Su presencia física es algo que sobrecoge a la gente.

translation.en: And people are transfixed by this.
translation.es: Y la gente queda paralizada por eso.

translation.en: [Montefiore] By 1901, Nicky and Alix have three daughters:
translation.es: Para 1901, Nicky y Alix tienen tres hijas... SAN PETERSBURGO 1901

translation.en: Olga, Tatiana, and Maria.
And when Alix gets pregnant again…
translation.es: Y cuando Alix se embaraza de nuevo...

translation.en: [Botkin] Breathe.
…everybody is longing for the much-needed son and heir.
translation.es: ...todos anhelan ese tan necesitado hijo y heredero.

translation.en: Oh, Lord, forgive us our sins.
May our prayers be answered.
We thank you for our daughters, but may you bless us now with a son.
translation.es: Te agradecemos a nuestras hijas, pero bendícenos con un hijo.

translation.en: -[Botkin] Push! Push it! -[shouts]
Tell me. [panting]
We have a beautiful, healthy baby.
translation.es: Tenemos una beba hermosa y sana.

translation.en: [gasps] I'm sorry!
A son would belong to the people.
translation.es: Un hijo sería de la gente.

translation.en: This little girl is ours.
Hello, Anastasia.
[Pierre] In Greek,
the name Anastasia means, "the one who is reborn."
translation.es: el nombre Anastasia significa "la que renace".

translation.en: Now I had to ask if she truly had been resurrected.
translation.es: Ahora debía preguntar si realmente había resucitado.

translation.en: The eyes are the same.
But not the face.
There may be good reasons for that.
translation.es: Quizá hay una razón para eso.

translation.en: Her jaw's been broken.
She has missing teeth.
She's been through serious emotional and physical trauma.
translation.es: Ha pasado por severos traumas físicos y emocionales.

translation.en: I don't know if anyone could have survived that massacre.
translation.es: No sé si alguien habría podido sobrevivir a esa masacre.

translation.en: [Pierre] One thing that is certain
is that the birth of Anastasia was both a blessing and a curse.
translation.es: que el nacimiento de Anastasia fue una bendición y una maldición.

translation.en: More than ever, Nicholas and Alexandra needed a son and heir.
translation.es: Más que nunca, Nicolás y Alejandra necesitaban un hijo y un heredero.

translation.en: [whispers] Come back to bed.
We need help.
[Pierre] And their desperation would open a door…
translation.es: Y su desesperación le abriría la puerta...

translation.en: [Alix] There must be something we can do.
translation.es: Debe haber algo que podamos hacer.

translation.en: …to a darkness that would destroy their world.
translation.es: ...a una oscuridad que destruiría su mundo.

translation.en: There must be someone.
